snippet: The performance artist Ana Mendieta died in 1985, but her older sister, Raquelin, discusses why a cache of films she made is now being exhibited.
abstract: Excerpts from conversation with artist Raquelin Mendieta about work of her sister Ana Mendieta, who died in 1985 and is now subject of exhibition Ana Mendieta: Experimental and Interactive Films at Galerie Lelong.
lead_paragraph: The performance artist Ana Mendieta died in 1985, but her older sister, Raquelin, discusses why a cache of films she made is now being exhibited.

headline.print_headline: New Work From Ana Mendieta, 30 Years After Her Death

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Ana Mendieta: Experimental and Interactive Films (Exhibit)
